title: EastEnders spoilers: Karen and Sonia clash over Keegan eloping with Tiffany
text:
Karen Taylor (Lorraine Stanley) was outraged when she heard that Keegan Baker (Zack Morris) and Tiffany Butcher (Maisie Smith) had become engaged in EastEnders, but she’s set to get an even bigger shock in the coming episodes when she learns that the pair are planning on eloping.

Several weeks back, Gray (Toby Alexander-Smith) and Chantelle (Jessica Plummer) planned a romantic evening, but things didn’t go according to plan and they were forced to return home. As a result, Keegan and Tiffany decided to make use of the free hotel room.

After discussing his future with Tiffany, Keegan took it upon himself to propose to the young woman — and she wasted little time in saying yes. Afterwards, the pair deliberated over when to tell their families, and they decided the sooner the better, and thus got their two clans together to drop the news.

Karen and Sonia (Natalie Cassidy) were concerned that the pairs’ impending announcement meant that a baby was on the way, but they were equally shocked when she learned of their engagement.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Since then, Tiffany and Keegan have made every effort to show their nearest and dearest just how serious they are about this, and in the coming episodes, they decide to elope.

However, once Karen learns of their plans, she’s shocked once more, and wastes little time in blaming Sonia on the whole thing — who’s far from impressed at the launderette manager’s accusations.

The question is — after they finish shouting the odds at one another — will they be able to come together and stop Tiff and Keegan in their tracks?

Karen and Sonia have made their opinions known on Tiff and Keegan’s plans in the past — as have Jack (Scott Maslen) and Whitney (Shona McGarty) — so they’ll no doubt be hellbent on putting a stop to the teenagers’ plans.

EastEnders airs these scenes on Thursday 7thNovember at 7:30pm on BBC One.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Karen gets quite the shock when she hears of Keegan and Tiffany's plan, and thus she wastes little time in doing something about it.
